sut_information.sut_description: Interactive cyber threat awareness platform with gamification, scoring systems, training content, and admin management capabilities

pages_discovered.title: Landing/Login Page
pages_discovered.functionality: Entry point with authentication and registration options

pages_discovered.title: User Dashboard/My Space
pages_discovered.functionality: Main user dashboard with gamified learning content

pages_discovered.title: User Management
pages_discovered.functionality: Complete user lifecycle management with bulk operations

pages_discovered.title: Leaderboard
pages_discovered.functionality: Competitive scoring display with user rankings

product_risks.risk: Complete input validation failure allowing XSS and SQL injection
product_risks.impact: Data breach, session hijacking, database corruption, admin account compromise
product_risks.mitigation: Comprehensive input sanitization, parameterized queries, CSP implementation

product_risks.impact: Full system compromise, user data manipulation, campaign corruption
product_risks.mitigation: Role-based access control testing, privilege escalation testing

product_risks.risk: User data exposure through insecure dashboard
product_risks.impact: Privacy violation, data leakage, competitive intelligence loss
product_risks.mitigation: Access control verification, data filtering validation
Authentication mechanism testing, session management validation

product_risks.impact: Malicious file execution, system compromise, mass data corruption
product_risks.mitigation: File validation testing, upload restriction verification

product_risks.risk: Score manipulation and gaming system abuse
product_risks.impact: Unfair competition, loss of platform credibility, training effectiveness degradation
product_risks.mitigation: Score calculation validation, anti-cheating mechanism testing

security_findings.observation: Live XSS and SQL injection payloads visible in user data: '; DROP TABLE users; --, Hacked Text, [DELETE TABLE: ALL]
security_findings.recommendation: Immediate input sanitization implementation required across all fields

security_findings.observation: Malicious usernames and department names containing system commands (sudo rm -rf /)
security_findings.recommendation: Implement strict character restrictions and validation for all user-editable fields

security_findings.observation: Sensitive user information potentially exposed to unauthorized users
security_findings.recommendation: Verify proper access controls and data filtering

functional_observations.notes: Standard email/password login with forgot password option
Gamified interface with multiple content categories and progress tracking
Full CRUD operations for users, campaigns, and departments
Real-time score tracking with leaderboard integration

test_scenarios: Valid registration with all required fields
Registration with malicious payloads in all fields
user_flows.notes: Critical path with high security risk - prioritize automated security testing

test_scenarios: Create user with malicious payloads in all fields
Edit existing user data with malicious content
Bulk user import with malicious CSV/Excel
Unauthorized access attempts to admin functions
required_test_data: Malicious file uploads (CSV, Excel with embedded scripts)
Non-admin user credentials for privilege escalation testing
user_flows.notes: High-risk admin functionality requiring both automated and manual security testing

test_scenarios: Complete game flow with valid inputs
required_test_data: Multiple user accounts for concurrent testing
user_flows.notes: Complex interactive content requiring manual testing for user experience

performance_notes: Login process takes 3-5 seconds with loading screens
Dashboard with large user tables may have performance issues
Multiple consecutive page loads show loading screens
recommendations_for_testing: Priority 1: CRITICAL - Comprehensive security testing across all input fields (OWASP ZAP, manual penetration testing)
Priority 2: HIGH - Admin panel privilege escalation and access control testing
Priority 3: HIGH - File upload security testing with malicious files
Priority 4: MEDIUM - Authentication mechanism testing (session management, password policies)
Priority 5: MEDIUM - Score manipulation and business logic testing
Automation: Playwright for functional flows, OWASP ZAP for security scanning, custom scripts for input validation testing
Manual: Game user experience, complex admin workflows, social engineering scenarios
Tools needed: Playwright, OWASP ZAP, Burp Suite, Malicious file samples, Input fuzzing tools
Immediate action required: The application shows evidence of successful attacks in production - immediate security assessment needed
